channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 68

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: The D10 area is large, but the problem is that the area is very difficult to secure. By taking the initiative and attacking the White group (though not the way I did it in the game), it is the best way to maintain the advantage that Black has.
item.content:encoded: The D10 area is large, but the problem is that the area is very difficult to secure. By taking the initiative and attacking the White group (though not the way I did it in the game), it is the best way to maintain the advantage that Black has.

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Hey Ben, Question: At move 52, would playing in the D10 area be a lot more beneficial before attacking the group? Awesome review Ben! Can't wait to play you again :)
item.content:encoded:
Hey Ben,
Question: At move 52, would playing in the D10 area be a lot more beneficial before attacking the group?
Awesome review Ben! Can’t wait to play you again ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Amen to that! And this is just the first of 9 pro simuls I played. Wait till you see the others!
item.content:encoded: Amen to that! And this is just the first of 9 pro simuls I played. Wait till you see the others!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thank you so much Molokai. You have no idea how much that means to hear that. I will be sure to keep working on making them better and more valuable. Thanks again for all the support man!
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much Molokai. You have no idea how much that means to hear that. I will be sure to keep working on making them better and more valuable. Thanks again for all the support man!

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: These are just awesome, Master. I really appreciate you taking the time. Learned more from your MGM than all the Go books I have now. You've created a unique 'genre' of analysis, game thinking and stream-of-consciousness. They deserve to be a book, although you might not want Lee Sedol to get your secrets. ;)
item.content:encoded: These are just awesome, Master. I really appreciate you taking the time. Learned more from your MGM than all the Go books I have now. You’ve created a unique ‘genre’ of analysis, game thinking and stream-of-consciousness. They deserve to be a book, although you might not want Lee Sedol to get your secrets. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I can recall most of it the day of usually, however, most of the games featured on here were played online so I don't have to worry about memorizing it.
item.content:encoded: I can recall most of it the day of usually, however, most of the games featured on here were played online so I don’t have to worry about memorizing it.

item.title: By: HeJin
item.dc:creator: HeJin
item.description: How do you remember a face to face game? can you recall it fully by heart after playing it, or is there some other way...
item.content:encoded: How do you remember a face to face game? can you recall it fully by heart after playing it, or is there some other way…
